hu.akarnokd.rxjava2.operators

Class BasicMergeSubscription<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Number
      • java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicInteger
        • hu.akarnokd.rxjava2.operators.BasicMergeSubscription<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the value type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.reactivex.internal.subscribers.InnerQueuedSubscriberSupport<T>, Serializable, Subscription

    public final class BasicMergeSubscription<T>
extends AtomicInteger
implements Subscription, io.reactivex.internal.subscribers.InnerQueuedSubscriberSupport<T>
    Subscription coordinator that merges items from a fixed set of source Publishers by picking the smallest available next item from them based on a Comparator.
    Since:
    0.17.9
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
